name: A NIGHT IN U.B.I.T
description:
An open beta of the game A Night In UBIT that I  worked  for a month, is out now.😋

When was the last time you were psyched to explore department(UBIT)?? Probably Never.
Introducing you with one of the most fascinating and intimidating game you could ever experience.
Experience the thrill and sensation of exploring the ground floor of the eminent UBIT in the night, equipped with nothing but a flashlight.😉

 Enjoy the jumpscares this game has and some easter eggs too.
